name: You Remembered Something
description:
The game is a mini Metroidvania made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam. The game has you start from the boss fight in the beginning and then sends you to the beginning of the game upon death. This fits into the game as it forces you to relive and rewind what the character had to do to get to the boss (Yeah it's a bit of a stretch on the connection). 

Controls:

E - Interact 

W, D, left, and right arrow - move left and right

Space - Jump

Left Click - Melee Attack

Right Click - Shoot

Shift - Dash

Disclaimer: Sorry for the 5 second load screen. Also the chests are how to acquire abilities.

Credits:
